column2:
'Q Tip'
'To prevent unnecessary files from eing included in the snapshot, make an'
'ignore file ( .gitignore or .amlignore) in the directory. Add the files and'
'directories to exclude to this file. For more information on the syntax to use'
'inside this file, see syntax and patterns 2 for .gitignore. The . amlignore file'
'uses the same syntax. If oth files exist, the . amLignore file is used and the'
'gitignore file is unused.'
